Description.Text: This modern hotel offers the best of both worlds - easy access to the sites of central London as well as a number of local attractions, including Hatfield and Knebworth house, paradise park and whipsnade wild animal park. Good childrens' facilities makes this a popular choice for families. Nearby Business locations include Hatfield, Welwyn Garden City, Borehamwood, Watford, Barnet and Finchley. As a venue for conferences or an overnight corporate stay, the hotel's location and recently refurbished bar, reception and restaurant make the hotel a very popular with corporate clients. The hotel has 14 purpose built academy meeting rooms all with air conditioning and natural day-light and many other features expected by modern conference users, such as modem points and data projectors. The hotel also offers a choice of Executive and standard rooms plus free parking.Exit the M25 at Junction 23 or from the A1 for the M25.
